attributes.action: publish full and open accounts of all monies claimed from the public purse by m.p`s.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: any one claiming money from the public purse,must publish full accounts to support their claim ,after all this our money,the perception is m.p`s have their noses in the trough,and its hardley suprising when you consider their recent antics.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
